unnormalised: Hey folks, feeling the pinch in your wallets lately? Gas cylinder prices are back in the spotlight, and not in a good way!
normalised: Hey folks, feeling the pinch in your wallets lately? Gas cylinder prices are back in the spotlight, and not in a good way!

unnormalised: Sources say Bharat Petroleum and Indian Oil might be tweaking rates again, possibly before Diwali. Imagine having to shell out even more for that festive biryani, ouch!
normalised: Sources say B H P and Indian Oil might be tweaking rates again, possibly before Diwali. Imagine having to shell out even more for that festive biryani, ouch!

unnormalised: Last month, we saw a jump of Rs. 50, remember the uproar? Now whispers suggest another hike is looming, maybe even hitting the Rs. 1200 mark per cylinder in Delhi.
normalised: Last month, we saw a jump of rupee fifty, remember the uproar? Now whispers suggest another hike is looming, maybe even hitting the rupee one thousand two hundred mark per cylinder in Delhi.

unnormalised: "The government is trying to balance things," says market analyst, Ms. Sharma from IIT Madras, "but global oil prices are playing spoilsport."
normalised: "The government is trying to balance things," says market analyst, Missus Sharma from I I T Madras, "but global oil prices are playing spoilsport."

unnormalised: Apparently, even subsidies are under review. What will happen for states like Kerala, already prepping for Onam celebrations?
normalised: Apparently, even subsidies are under review. What will happen for states like Kerala, already prepping for Onam celebrations?

unnormalised: Rumours also suggest that the 'Ujjwala Yojana' might see some changes too. Will the sarkar keep it affordable for everyone, or are we bracing for some serious kitchen budget adjustments? Stay tuned for more updates, and maybe stock up on firewood…just kidding (mostly)!
normalised: Rumours also suggest that the 'Ujjwala Yojana' might see some changes too. Will the sarkar keep it affordable for everyone, or are we bracing for some serious kitchen budget adjustments? Stay tuned for more updates, and maybe stock up on firewood…just kidding (mostly)!
